text: SimGolf is a video game created by Maxis in 1996. The game allows players to design their own golf courses and play them. == Critical reception == The game received a score of 2 out of 5 stars from Computer Games Strategy Plus. == References == Category:1996 video games Category:Maxis Sim games Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Video games scored by Jerry Martin Category:Windows games Category:Windows-only games Category:Golf video games
title: SimGolf
